thread.title: Saudis Discuss Oil-Price Concerns With OPEC, Russia

author: Benoit Faucon
title: Saudis Discuss Oil-Price Concerns With OPEC, Russia
text:
Saudi Arabia said Thursday it was discussing concerns over volatile oil prices with other OPEC members and Russia after the cost of a barrel reached its highest level in 3½ years.
Brent crude oil prices reached $80 a barrel Thursday amid concerns the Trump administration’s withdrawal from a nuclear pact with Iran will crimp the country’s oil exports and reduce global supply.
